features: 【Stable & Durable Utensil Crock】 Made of under 2200℉ high temperature ceramic, this ceramic utensil holder is clearly heavier than ones made of other materials, steadily stands on your countertop; glaze & durable material, withstands long-time daily uses.

【Large Utensil Holder】 Opening diameter :4.04 in ,height : 6.6 in. Large utensil crock able to accommodate 10 to 15 common big cooking utensils - spatulas,tongs, servers, turners, spoons, forks, and is ideal for adding storage in compact spaces in the kitchen counter.A convenient solution for overflowing kitchen drawers and countertop clutter.

【Not Just a Cooking Utensil Holder】 It can be used not only as a spatula spoon cutlery holder, kitchen utensil organizer, but also to hold any other items you can or can’t imagine - paintbrushes, candies, fruits etc. and even act as an ice bucket, a planter, a vase.

【Modern ceramic House Decor】This elegant and multi-purposed optimal organizer or vase is the best for those seeking a trendy, stylish look. Add a little charm to your home decor! If you’re looking for a aesthetic gift for your love, look no further, this will be a great gift she will use.

【Easy to Clean】 The Matte black kitchen utensils holder is designed with ceramic , so you can see any dirt in the rustic utensil holder at any time. When cleaning the kitchen regularly, the cooking utensil holder can easy to rinse and dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Colorful and practical!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Functional Addition to the Kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: The Black Kitchen Utensil Holder for Countertop has become a standout feature in my kitchen, effortlessly combining functionality with a touch of modern elegance. This 6.6-inch matte ceramic utensil holder not only keeps my kitchen organized but also adds a stylish flair to my countertop, earning its well-deserved 5-star rating.First and foremost, the matte black finish exudes sophistication, seamlessly fitting into my farmhouse kitchen decor. The understated elegance of the ceramic material elevates the overall aesthetic, making it a focal point on my countertop.The size of the utensil holder is perfect, providing ample space for all my cooking essentials without taking up too much counter real estate. It easily accommodates a variety of utensils, from spatulas and ladles to whisks and tongs, keeping them within arm's reach for convenient access during cooking.The sturdiness of the ceramic construction ensures that the utensil holder remains stable on the countertop, even when fully loaded. The smooth surface is easy to clean – a quick wipe-down and it looks as good as new. The wide mouth design allows for easy retrieval and placement of utensils, saving me time in the kitchen.What sets this utensil holder apart is its versatility. It doesn't just corral kitchen tools; it's a statement piece that enhances the overall ambiance of my kitchen. The minimalist design, coupled with the matte black finish, makes it a timeless addition to any kitchen setting.In conclusion, the Black Kitchen Utensil Holder for Countertop is a 5-star gem that combines style and functionality seamlessly. Its modern design, matte black allure, and ample capacity make it a must-have for those looking to declutter their kitchen in a chic and elegant manner. I highly recommend this utensil holder to fellow Amazon shoppers – it's a practical and stylish addition that has truly enhanced both the organization and visual appeal of my kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size Matters (a little)
reviews.reviewText: The idea here is to have the tools you use most frequently out on the counter when you start cooking so you don't have to dig around in a drawer while your omelet is burning. (Pro Tip: get out the tools you need as part of your mise en place before you start cooking.)Scrounging through my drawer, I decided that I needed a microplaner, small tongs, a small silicone basting brush, a peeler, a set of measuring spoons, a small whisk and my beloved small offset spatula. If you look at the photos, you'll notice that some of these items are barely visible in the holder. I ordered the 7.9-inch holder. In retrospect, I wish I had ordered the 6.6-inch version. I hadn't really thought about how small some of my tools are. They're not hard to find in the larger holder but it would have worked better with the smaller one.The holder itself seems very well made, very nice uniform finish and the ceramic seems strong. It survived a trip through the dishwasher. It's heavy enough that it won't tip over easily even with a big microplaner sticking out of it. You still need to remember that this is a ceramic item. There's a reason Ming Dynasty vases are rare.This now has a place in my kitchen. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Useful and stylish on my counter
reviews.reviewText: This black utensil holder, bold and tall as it is, brings out a simple, minimalist statement that matches the style of my kitchen. It is 6.5 “ tall, 4” around and can hold several utensils. They should be the taller ones, as I have some 8” wooden and they just barely stick out of the container. But the majority of my most often used sit well in it and I find it handy to have them right on the counter. The mat black color does look elegant and fragile but it is sturdy, not too heavy ceramic. I do like this item and it looks good with my black toaster and black coffee pot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Minimalist Design
reviews.reviewText: This simple sleek utensil holder has a very minimalist vibe to it, and is really pretty. I wasn't too sure about it when I ordered it, but the height of it really makes a difference. Does it hold everything I need? No, but I'm not a minimalist, and I have a ton of utensils because I develop and write recipes everyday, so I need more than the average person. But I really like it and I can see it working for other people much more than I can myself. If it were wider, it would fit my needs much better. But otherwise it is a good, well-made product that I am quite sure most people will love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This keeps my spatulas handy next to the stove instead of shoved into a drawer. It cleans easily and looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Utensil Holder For Kitchen
reviews.reviewText: This thing's very pretty and sturdy, and looks good anywhere you put it. Perfect for holding kitchen utensils, and can also be used for other purposes ... on a desk, in the bath, or wherever you like. A definite keeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved that it was wider, if you also put your kitchen utensils in a cup/vase then this will be their replacement. It is definitely worth getting, price is low, and sturdiness is high.
